summary: ICP dapp scaffolded with Motoko backend and React/Tailwind frontend, including Internet Identity authentication and a Valentine-themed UI with photo gallery and floating hearts overlay.

existing_features.title: Motoko backend canister scaffold
existing_features.description: Core Internet Computer backend implemented in Motoko with generated candid bindings exposed to the frontend.

existing_features.title: React + Vite + Tailwind frontend scaffold
existing_features.description: Client application bootstrapped with React/Vite and styled with Tailwind, wired to talk to the backend canister.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication integration
existing_features.description: Frontend hooks and checks to authenticate users via Internet Identity provider and create an authenticated actor for backend calls.

existing_features.title: Valentine-themed landing page UI
existing_features.description: Primary UI page implementing the Valentine experience, including layout and themed presentation.

existing_features.title: Photo gallery component
existing_features.description: Frontend photo gallery component for displaying user photos within the app experience.

existing_features.title: Floating hearts overlay effect
existing_features.description: Animated overlay component rendering floating hearts as a visual effect.

existing_features.title: Client-side storage utility
existing_features.description: Utility layer for storing/retrieving app data on the client side (used by the UI components).

existing_features.title: Build/deploy template for ICP project
existing_features.description: Repository includes a build-template with Dockerfile, deploy scripts, canister.yaml configs, and tooling for packaging the ICP React app.

existing_features.title: Shadcn UI component set included
existing_features.description: Prebuilt shadcn/ui component library added to the template/frontend for rapid UI composition.

architectural_notes: Frontend uses React (Vite) + Tailwind and includes shadcn/ui components for UI primitives.
Authentication is handled via Internet Identity; frontend creates an authenticated actor for canister calls.
Project is structured as an ICP dapp with separate frontend and Motoko backend canisters, plus generated candid bindings.
Build/deploy is standardized via a build-template (Dockerfile/scripts/canister.yaml) for reproducible packaging/deployment.
